LanguageData.CGearTech.label: Tactical Charged Gear
LanguageData.CGearTech.description: Grants the ability to make computerised charged items.
LanguageData.CGearTech_Armour.label: TC Armour
LanguageData.CGearTech_Armour.description: Grants the ability to make computerised charged armour.
LanguageData.CGearTech_Turrets.label: TC Turrets
LanguageData.CGearTech_Turrets.description: Allows the ability to make computerised charged turrets.
LanguageData.CGearTechEnhance.label: TC Gear Enhancements
LanguageData.CGearTechEnhance.description: Grants the ability to enhance computerised charged items.
LanguageData.CGearTechSpecialist.label: TC Gear Specialization
LanguageData.CGearTechSpecialist.description: Grants the ability to specialise computerised charged items.
LanguageData.CGearTech_AdvGrd.label: TC Gear Explosives
LanguageData.CGearTech_AdvGrd.description: Grants the ability to make specialized explosives.
LanguageData.CGearTech_AdvShells.label: TC Gear Adv. Shells
LanguageData.CGearTech_AdvShells.description: Grants the ability to make advanced shells and IDEs.
LanguageData.CGearTechTPC.label: Tactical Cannons
LanguageData.CGearTechTPC.description: Grants the ability to make TC Cannons.
